title: Technician
body:
Hello, curious construction!
<<if !visited("Technician")>>
    I thought I built the most advanced things on this island.
    But a glance at you tells me otherwise.
    <<if !$scrap>>
        If you brought me a bit of scrap I could probably fix you up.
        It'd be an absolute honor to look inside your inner workings.
    <<else>>
        I see you have some scrap on you, I can repair you if you give it to me.
        As often as you'd like!
        -> Yes, please.
            Give me one second while I analyse your chassis.
            Okay I think I have what it takes to fix you together.
            [[Technician.Heal]]
        -> No I like it for myself
            You surely are a curious creature, but go ahead.
            Tell me though, do you eat the metal?
            I'm just curious...
    <<endif>>
    -> I actually have a letter for you. <<if visited("Postperson.GivePost")>>
        [[Technician.TakePost]]
<<else>>
    <<if !$scrap>>
        like I told you previously,
        if you brought me a bit of scrap I could probably fix you up.
        It'd be an absolute honor to look at your inner workings.
    <<else>>
        <<if !visited("Technician.Heal")>>
            I see you have some scrap on you, I can repair you if you give it to me.
            As often as you'd like!
            -> Yes, please.
                Okay, here we go.
                [[Technician.Heal]]
            -> No I like it for myself
                You surely are a curious creature, but go ahead.
                Tell me though, do you eat the metal?
                I'm just curious...
        <<else>>
            Want me to heal you up again?
            -> Yes, please.
                [[Technician.Heal]]
        <<endif>>
        -> I actually have a letter for you. <<if visited("Postperson.GivePost")>>
            [[Technician.TakePost]]
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: Technician.Heal
body:
<<SetHP Player 7>>
Okay, I removed all dents,
you should be good as new.
The systems in you are astounding,
come back any time.

title: Technician.TakePost
body:
Oh, that's quite a heavy letter.
Probably my new tools, thanks for bringing them.
